text: The Champ is a 1931 American drama movie directed by King Vidor and starring Wallace Beery, Jackie Cooper, Irene Rich, Roscoe Ates, Edward Brophy. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 4 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1931. It was remade twice in 1953 as The Clown and in 1979 as The Champ. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by King Vidor Category:Movies about alcoholism
title: The Champ
